name: SOUL BROKER
description:
You have lost your soul on the Soul Stock Market to the Starseed Corporation! You must take your soul back from the wretched starspawn CEO of Starseed or face eternal damnation. Kill all his employees/spawn and their associates and chop down the tree once and for all!

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021!

Soundtrack:
https://soundcloud.com/khorheal/dont-have-time-to-play-with-myself
https://soundcloud.com/khorheal/c9h9no3

Credits

"Heartbeat, Regular, Single, 01-01, LOOP.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

The Devil Net font bv Chris Vile of Font Monger

Inspired by They Live, Corporate Monster, the current state of the stock market (Gamestop) and the baseless "conspiracy theories" of adrenachrome and many more stuff!
